response.original_title: Mark Fisher - 'How to Kill a Zombie: Strategizing the End of Neoliberalism'
response.overview: Mark Fisher speaking at the 'Neoliberalism, Crisis and the World System' conference organised by Nicholas Gane and Claire Westall at the University of York, UK, July 3rd, 2013. For a full conference programme, see http://www.york.ac.uk/... Funding for this event came from the British Academy and the Centre for Modern Studies at York.
response.title: Mark Fisher - 'How to Kill a Zombie: Strategizing the End of Neoliberalism'
